1.content:
The true Bermuda Triangle consists of five realms, these realms are:

- Polax: The Land of Ice
- Atlantis: The Kingdom of Currents
- Krano: The Empire of Flames
- Garrica: The City of Hestia
- Shimia: The Forrest of Nightmares

More information about the realms will be given in their respective chapters.

Besides entering the realms and doing whatever you wish there will be a story that can be followed if you would like.

The story:

The character was accidentally sucked into the Bermuda triangle while on their first solo test flight (Age 16 or older). They were wearing their lucky charm, a stone with light blue markings later revealed to be the Yeti's Heart (You'll find out what that is later) In order to exit the Triangle the character will have to travel through each realm (In the order from above) and collect each realm's relic before being able to return home safely.


The story is only optional and doesn't have to be followed, there will be routes in each realm that doesn't involve the story at all (Meaning the Yeti's Heart will in fact be in Bermuda not on earth)

So, with all the confusing explanations out of the way which realm would you dare enter? (Enter Polax to start the story)
1.title: The True Bermuda Triangle

11.content:
Polax is the main convening realm in Bermuda. It is in relevant peace scarce of wars and without ruler, it is universally considered no man’s land. Because of this many inns and trading towns were set up around Polax and the creatures are largely diverse. There are of course many hostile creatures though they stay in the caves and mountains around Polax, that house a plethora of priceless gems and minerals, some with supernatural abilities. The most sort after and legendary item in Polax is the Yeti’s Heart, a rune with the ability to give its owner complete domination of Polax and its native creatures, no one has ever been able to find the rune but rumours state it is located at the centre of the realm in Mount Latik.

Yeti’s Heart - The Yeti’s Heart can be used to grant its owner the Yeti’s power, giving them the ability to use a variety of ice powers and increasing their strength, it also turns the users hair and clothes white while in the transformed state.
11.title: Polax: The Land of Ice

113.content: Polax is a pretty cold place, you sure you aren't half Yeti, or Gray Fullbuster? No, then who are you?
113.title: Eskimos Of The Bermuda

114.content: Another traveller visiting Polax? Well make yourself at home, there are a collection of shops and buildings for your every need. So what should I call you?
114.title: Yet Another One

12.content:
The underwater kingdom is home to many aquatic species of cryptids. The special magic pillars around Atlantis allow humans to breathe easily in its waters, making exploring the deep ocean possible. The City in the centre of Atlantis is ruled by the Kumari Kandam and are the rulers of the entire realm, they govern the laws in the realm and keep the inhabitance safe from dangers. The Kumari Kandam’s protection reaches far but beyond that is the territory of Cetus, a hideous sea monster who devours all who cross him, he guards Cetus’ Light, an orb of great power that many greedy and evil people sort after. While not an issue for most of the underwater creatures there is a law passed in Atlantis that affects humans, most of the creatures in Atlantis don't produce any waste, humans however do and as such the Kumari Kandam have decreed that any human entering Atlantis must be wearing some sort of diaper to prevent their waste entering the waters of Atlantis, any human without a diaper on will be punished if caught.

Cetus’ Light - An orb that transforms the holder into an astral form, while in this form they can only affect and be affected by energy, no physical items will touch them. They will also be able to manipulate water to use offensively or defensively. The holders astral form will be translucent and grey, much like a ghost.
12.title: Atlantis: The Kingdom of Currents

121.content: A human living in Atlantis, I'd assume you were just never potty trained. So, who had to grow up with diapers full time?
121.title: Under The Sea

122.content: I'd imagine Atlantis would be the perfect vacation spot, it's bound to be beautiful. I hope you remembered to diaper yourself, I hear punishment is severe. Who will be vacationing in Atlantis?
122.title: Surreal Vacation

13.content:
A war torn world full of hatred and destruction. An everlasting war between demons and cryptids turned Krano inside out, literally, fire and lava protrude through ever crack in the ground. The citizens live in poverty and fear. The war is fought over the Phoenix Feather, a powerful artefact able to tame Krano’s flames and bend it to the will of the holder. Unfortunately for the humans of Krano neither the cryptids nor demons consider them on their side and as such most humans are murdered on site, leading to many orphaned children, a lot of the human colonies are underground to hide from the monsters.

Phoenix Feather - A red glowing feather that gives its holder fire powers along with wings. While in the transformed state the user will be impervious to heat and be able to manipulate and generate flames. Their hair and clothes will turn the colour of flames while transformed.
13.title: Krano: The Empire of Flames

131.content: So you live in one of the secret underground colonies in Krano, what age range are you in?
131.title: The Secret Colony

132.content: Are you hear to stop the war or are you just passing through? Could you be looking for the Phoenix Feather as well? Who are you if you think you have a chance?
132.title: To Stop The War

14.content:
A blessing to women and curse to men, the city is strictly run by females, furthermore, the odd aura around Garrica enchant men, making them gradually incontinent, males born in Garrica never become potty trained, wearing diapers their entire lives and any man entering Garrica will start having nighttime accidents within a few days. As such female humans are far more common as opposed male humans. Garrica is also home to many Harpies, Succubi and Incubi along with other urban cryptids. The Harpy’s Egg is what powers the large city, is situated in a generator far below the city. After an incident when men tried to steal the egg a century ago the enchantment to make men infantile was implemented.

Harpy’s Egg - A round stone that can be used to seduce any creature regardless of species, age or gender. Using this item with transform its user into a Harpy, giving them talons and wings, they will also be able to control the winds and send ear-splitting screams towards enemies.
14.title: Garrica: The City of Hestia

141.content: Would you like to be a female in a position of power or a man in a position of well...diaper wearing?
141.title: Life In Garrica

142.content: So, what brave soul dares to enter the city run by Harpies?
142.title: Welcome To Garrica

15.content:
Ruled by Owlman, Shimia is a realm where all your nightmares come to life, it is bereft of any life other than Owlman and his collection. Olwman’s collection consists of any human and cryptid stupid enough to enter his land, he keeps the animalistic creatures in his personal zoo while the humans and humanoid cryptids are kept in his elaborate underground dungeon. For his own amusement the humans are allowed to wander free and find the exit, however the convoluted nature of the dungeon ensures that anyone who attempts to escape will soon get lost. To add to his sick humour there are no toilets or suitable substitutes in the dungeons, Owlman has however supplied a near endless supply of diapering products. Any human not willing to wear a diaper will soon find themselves needing new pants.

Owlman’s Claw - Owlman’s most priced possession, it is an immensely powerful gauntlet that can be used to manipulate shadows and bring nightmares to life. The gauntlet shrouds its wearing in dark aura and turns their eyes red. On the gauntlet are four indents that perfectly hold the other four relics, if all four relics are placed on the gauntlet the wearer will have complete control of Bermuda.
15.title: Shimia: The Forrest of Nightmares

151.content: Must suck to live in a dungeon. What gender are you?
151.title: Trapped

152.content: Or very stupid...probably the latter. Who dares to enter the territory of Owlman?
152.title: A Truely Brave Soul

info.description:
One of the largest mysteries known to man is the Bermuda Triangle. What the world doesn't know is that the large body of water is merely the gateway to the real Bermuda. Beware those who enter, not everyone returns from the triangle intact.

Rules:

No excessive swearing, mild swearing is allowed

No explicit sex scenes and absolutely no sex involving minors. Due to the inclusion on Succubi and other similar creatures sex in the story is encouraged but skip the actual scene.

While it's not necessary this story is at its core a diaper story but it doesn't have to be included in certain stories, (This ones more of a warning that there will be diaper content.)

Have Fun!
